name: Shenzyn
description: Shenzyn is a Marketplace for Diversity Growth, a 360-degree Career Building ecosystem.Shenzyn’s foundation is based on Diversity, Inclusivity, artificial intelligence and emotional intelligence. When artificial intelligence and emotional intelligence come together, more opportunities are created and facilitated with the right learning and experience.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Aspire. Apply. Achieve.
ShortDescription: An exclusive platform for the women to find the most suitable opportunities and ready themselves to advance their career, faster.
enhanced_description: Shenzyn is a global marketplace specifically designed for Diversity Growth, functioning as a 360-degree Career Building ecosystem primarily for women professionals. The platform's core foundation integrates artificial intelligence and emotional intelligence to create and facilitate more opportunities, ensuring the right learning and experience for career advancement. It serves as an exclusive platform for women to find suitable career opportunities and prepare themselves for faster career progression, complementing its role as a Diversity Training Marketplace for organizations.
key_use_cases: Facilitating diversity hiring and talent acquisition initiatives
Providing a dedicated job board for women professionals
Offering a career building ecosystem for women's professional development
Delivering diversity training through a marketplace model
Enhancing hiring manager confidence and productivity in diverse talent acquisition
competitive_advantages: Exclusive platform dedicated to women professionals
Foundation rooted in the combination of artificial intelligence and emotional intelligence
Global platform reach for diverse talent acquisition
Focus on Diversity and Inclusivity as a core offering
hr_functions_supported: Learning & Development (through career building and diversity training)
roi_benefits: Boosts hiring manager confidence and productivity
Creates and facilitates more opportunities for diverse talent
Enables women professionals to advance their careers faster
primary_users: Women professionals (seeking career opportunities and development)
Organizations (focused on DEI and talent acquisition)
